info.title: Finance REST API
info.description:
Secure, authorized access to TruckMate's financial data, including Payroll, Accounts Payable (AP), Accounts Receivable (AR), and General Ledger (GL) data.

[Download latest released OpenAPI](https://truckmatecloudhub.trimble-transportation.com/finance/openapi.json "download")


 This documentation is based on the most currently released version of TruckMate. Documentation for previous versions can be accessed by navigating to the openapi.json endpoint for any given API (the service must be set up and running). For example: http://DOMAIN/openapi.json



---

Â© 2025, Trimble Inc. All rights reserved. Unauthorized copying prohibited. Software functions, including our APIs and their specification, are subject to change without notice. Information contained herein is Trimble Confidential Information, used under license.

---

tags.name: GL Account Segments
tags.description: TruckMate General Ledger Account Segments API.

tags.name: GL Account Types
tags.description: TruckMate General Ledger Account Types API.

tags.name: User Fields Data
tags.description: Retrieve user field records for finance-related sources.

tags.name: Version
tags.description: The version endpoint allows the ART server version information to be retrieved. This will include the version number of the TruckMate ART Server (Windows Service) application.

tags.name: Whoami
tags.description: Retrieves identity of the user associated with the provided authorization method.

get.description:
Retrieve accounts receivable information records.

Accounts receivable information can be viewed in the AR Inquiry application.

Retrieve accounts payable invoice records.

Accounts payable invoices can be viewed in the AP Invoice Entry application.

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Expand applicable sub-resources separated by comma.

post.summary: Create a new accounts payable invoice
post.description:
Creates one or more accounts payable invoice records.

Accounts payable invoices can be viewed in the AP Invoice Entry application.

requestBody.description: The $select system query option allows clients to requests a specific set of properties for each entity or complex type.

get.description:
Retrieve the specified accounts payable invoice record.

Accounts payable invoices can be viewed in the AP Invoice Entry application.

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Expand applicable sub-resources separated by comma.

put.description:
Updates one or more properties for the specified accounts payable invoice records.

Accounts payable invoices can be viewed in the AP Invoice Entry application.

requestBody.description: The $select system query option allows clients to requests a specific set of properties for each entity or complex type.

delete.description:
Delete the specified accounts payable invoice records.

Accounts payable invoices can be viewed in the AP Invoice Entry application.

Accounts payable driver deductions can be viewed in the AP Invoice Entry Application > Driver Deduction tab.

Accounts payable driver deductions can be viewed in the AP Invoice Entry Application > Driver Deduction tab.

Accounts payable driver deductions can be viewed in the AP Invoice Entry Application > Driver Deduction tab.

Delete the specified accounts payable driver deduction records.

Accounts payable driver deductions can be viewed in the AP Invoice Entry Application > Driver Deduction tab.

Retrieve the specified driver statement records.

Driver statements can be viewed in the Driver Pay Audit application > Pay Statement History.

Retrieve employee payment information records.

The TruckMate API User will be required to have 'Employee Program Security Clearance: Security Level 3' to access the employee payments endpoints.

Employee payments can be viewed in the Payroll Time Sheets application.

TruckMate user security level can be viewed in the Security Configuration Application > Security Tab > Clearance Button.

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Expand applicable sub-resources separated by comma.

get.description:
Retrieve the specified employee payment batch records.

Employee payment batches can be viewed in the Payroll Time Sheets application.

The TruckMate API User will be required to have 'Employee Program Security Clearance: Security Level 3' to access the employee payments endpoints.

TruckMate user security level can be viewed in the Security Configuration Application > Security Tab > Clearance Button.

Update the specified interliner payable record.

Interliner payables can be viewed in the Interliner Payable Audit application.

Only certain fields can be updated. The interlinerPayableId in the URL must match the ID in the request body.

Vendor payments can be viewed in the AP Inquiry application.

get.summary: Retrieve the ART server version information
get.description: Retrieves the version information of the related ART server.
Get information about this authenticated user

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Specifies the maximum number of items to include in the response results.

offset.name: offset
offset.description: Specifies the number of items to skip before beginning to select the records to return.

filter.name: $filter
filter.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionfilter). Note, not all features of oData filter syntax are supported.

select.name: $select
select.description: Select allows to request a specific set of properties, see [Selecting](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part2-url-conventions.html#_Toc31361040)

orderBy.name: $orderBy
orderBy.description: Field(s) to order returned resource by, with optional direction. E.g., "fieldName desc, fieldName2"

noResponseBody.name: $noResponseBody
noResponseBody.description: When enabled, an empty reponse body (response code 204) will be returned, otherwise a full response body will be returned.

currencyRateLocation.name: location
currencyRateLocation.description: Specify the type of currency rate records.

sourceType.name: sourceType
sourceType.description: Specify the type of user fields

tidJwtAuth.description: A time-limited JSON Web Token generated via separate POST request using TID
